common_issues.solution: Check if LinkedIn changed their HTML structure. Update CSS selectors in the Parse Job Results node.
Verify PostgreSQL credentials and server accessibility. Check if database exists.
Verify Slack bot permissions and channel access. Check OAuth token validity.

Ensure webhook workflows are active and paths are correct. Check authentication.
